original_title: Two including 17-year-old drown after boat capsizes in Mahaweli River
original_body_lines: Two persons, including a 17-year-old, have reportedly drowned after their boat capsized in the Mahaweli River in Kinniya.
According to police, the boat had capsized while the 17-year-old youth and a 35-year-old were fishing in a tributary of the river.
